GALLERY.MEDIA_DESCRIPTION_1: Experience the art of grooming with our professional barbers, ensuring a precise and stylish look every time.
GALLERY.MEDIA_DESCRIPTION_2: Our premium beard care services leave your beard feeling soft, healthy, and perfectly groomed.
GALLERY.MEDIA_DESCRIPTION_3: We combine tradition and modern techniques to deliver the perfect haircut that suits your personality.

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.GENERAL_CUT_DESC: The perfect cut for your eyebrows, precise and styled.
SERVICES.BLADE_SHADE_DESC: Blade shading to enhance and define your eyebrows.
SERVICES.BEARD_TRIM_DESC: Keep your beard well-shaped with a precise trim.
SERVICES.FACIAL_CLEANSE_DESC: Deep cleansing that revitalizes your face.
SERVICES.TRIBAL_DESIGN_DESC: Unique, modern designs to express your style.
SERVICES.BEARD_SHADE_DESC: Give your beard a soft, even shading.
SERVICES.BLACK_MASK_DESC: Intense cleansing with our black mask to remove impurities.
SERVICES.HAIR_DYE_DESC: Vibrant, long-lasting colors for your hair.
SERVICES.HIGHLIGHTS_DESC: Add light and depth to your hair with highlights.

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Our Products
PRODUCTS.HAIR_GEL_DESCRIPTION: Keep your hair styled and fresh all day with our premium hair gel.
PRODUCTS.SHAVING_CREAM_DESCRIPTION: Smooth and comfortable shaving cream for the perfect shave.
PRODUCTS.BEARD_OIL_DESCRIPTION: Nourish and condition your beard with our organic beard oil.
